definition.de:
Aktiviere oder deaktiviere Kommentare für dieses Video.
siehe [peertube documentation](https://framagit.org/framasoft/peertube/documentation/-/blob/master/api-activitypub.md#supported-objects-1) - fallback für mobilizon
definition.en:
Enable or disable comments for this video.
see [peertube documentation](https://framagit.org/framasoft/peertube/documentation/-/blob/master/api-activitypub.md#supported-objects-1) - fallback for mobilizon
definition.fr:
Activer ou désactiver les commentaires pour cette vidéo.
voir [peertube documentation](https://framagit.org/framasoft/peertube/documentation/-/blob/master/api-activitypub.md#supported-objects-1) - fallback for mobilizon
definition.es:
Activar o desactivar los comentarios para este vídeo.
ver [peertube documentation](https://framagit.org/framasoft/peertube/documentation/-/blob/master/api-activitypub.md#supported-objects-1) - fallback for mobilizon

title.de: ActivityPub und Freunde - Eine Ontolgie des Fediverse
title.en: ActivityPub and friends – An ontology of the fediverse
